website_summaries.verdict: Boys can wear these socks to school or for play with confidence in the comfort and style they provide.
pros: Cotton, polyester, and spandex provide a good fit and wick away moisture
Great for sports or casual, every-day wear
Available in toddler to teen sizes
cons: Holes in the toes are possible with regular, active wear
Some piling after washing is also possible

customer_reviews.title: Thick and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these socks! He’s 6 and can not handle seems in his toes. He’s a happy guy.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Expected Better From Under Armour
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these socks. They don't stay up well but he's happy with them. Im not as thrilled because after just once wear three bottoms are fuzzy/ strings coming off and I can see they'll have holes very quickly. I expected better from Under Armour.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: Buying socks for my son is always tricky because of sizing. These fit great. He is almost 9 and wears a size 2 shoe. These socks don't go as high up as the Nike Socks we bought, which is fine. Matched great with the clothes we bought him.
customer_reviews.author: Jspin

customer_reviews.title: great fit and style
customer_reviews.text: my son really likes these. not too thick, not too thin (he wears through the toes on most socks). Great height, again not too talk,, not too short. loves the colors
customer_reviews.author: CR-Berkeley

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect on my son who is 7 and has large feet
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect on my son who is 7 and has large feet. They are thick enough but not overly thick and provide good cushion during his football games with his cleats on.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Basquit

customer_reviews.title: Just the name
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Just paying for name. These socks were bought for my 5 year old nephew. There was a hole in one of the pairs after one use. They did fit him just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these socks. Just a little high priced.
customer_reviews.author: acollins7630

customer_reviews.title: Stays up
customer_reviews.text: Tight enough to stay on my 7 yo, he's about 50lbs. But not too tight. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: MelisaPetersonLewis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fabric with nice graphics
customer_reviews.text: Son’s been wearing these for a few months now and no holes! Comfortable fabric with nice graphics.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Osbun

customer_reviews.title: Under Armor boys crew socks
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. My son loves underarmor. These were not knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: TLeets

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old son's favorite.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these socks! Need to purchase more! Great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Beth B, RN

customer_reviews.title: For true to size
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old boy loved these and so did his cousins
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My son loves all things UA and these are no exception. Nice colors/pattern. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: yankeegirl1025

customer_reviews.title: Awesome products
customer_reviews.text: Will continue to buy from under armour. Love there product
customer_reviews.author: Kuntry panda

customer_reviews.title: My basketball player loves them
customer_reviews.text: Fit to size fashionable and he says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssa Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good socks that hold up to boys wear and tear. No holes so far!
customer_reviews.author: Gabbi500

customer_reviews.title: My son was happy with them!
customer_reviews.text: Great socks! They look exactly like what I ordered. My son was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Missing item
customer_reviews.text: It is missing one sock from one of the pairs.
customer_reviews.author: jessica strayer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little too small when compared to other brands of same size.
customer_reviews.author: Reva Dann Haskin

customer_reviews.title: Good socks.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my son, he loves the look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Good basketball socks
customer_reviews.text: Really good socks. Actually purchased for my daughter who plays a lot of basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Conner

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 6 year old very well. Great quality you always expect from Under Armour. Will be buying him more.
customer_reviews.author: MGrag

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves these socks! He wears a size 1.5 in a shoe and they’ll fit him for a while I believe. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: matt henderson

customer_reviews.title: Top quality athletic socks
customer_reviews.text: Best kids socks fur an athletic boy we have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Leonel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This socks are perfect for my two boys who are very picky about socks :)
customer_reviews.author: John Robert Mitchell

product_meta.title: Under Armour Youth Phenom Logo Crew Socks, 3-Pairs
product_meta.description: Under Armour brand mission is to make all athletes better through passion, science and the relentless pursuit of innovation. Today's athlete demands a sock that not only represents the look and feel of the brand, but that simultaneously provides useful, technical attributes bridging the gap between style and functionality.
feature_bullets: Strategic cushion reduces bulk and delivers flexibility
Dynamic arch support helps reduce foot fatigue and ventilation channels enhance breathability
Anti-odor technology helps prevent odor in the sock
Material wicks sweat and dries fast
